text: mariyu miru enta korina, mi bharyala madhya purti n'yayam ceyatam mi cetakani pani. Kanuka oka bharya vaipunaku ekkuvaga moggi, marokamenu dolayamana sthitilo vadalakandi. Miru mi pravartananu sari jesukoni daivabhiti kaligi undandi! Endukante niscayanga, allah ksamasiludu, apara karuna pradata
